  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Using a graphics card without full DX12 support will cause the game to crash on launch. The GTX 900 and 1000 series have partial, but incomplete, DX12 support, so the game will crash on those cards. While you can force the game to run with DirectX 11 using '-dx11' in the launch options, it'll run very poorly, as the Corruption effect relies on DX12.
